00116 //  Histogram Definitions (depricated)
00117 //
00118 //  Number arrays are TOT_WFD_CH, not N_SILICON_CHANNELS, because there are events with strip>72,73,74,75
00119 //  in Run06 which are target events. These histograms are deleted before ROOT file closing 
00120 //  anyway though, need to be declared to aviod crash in histogram filling rouitne in process_event()
